name: Food Bebe
text:
SANDWICHES & WRAPS
All sandwiches come with a choice of soup or salad
3B Grilled Cheese
Brie cheese, bacon and berry coulis grilled to perfection to combine a slightly sweet, salty and creamy creation.
14
Banhi Mi
Seasoned beef/pork pattie topped with pickled carrots/radish, cucumber, cilantro, jalapeno and sriracha scallion mayo on a baguette. Side soup or salad.
14
Chicken Cordon Bleu Sandwich
Chicken maple ham, french mustard Swiss cheese, cream sauce, arugula on a toasted bun. Comes with side salad or soup.
15
Black Bean & Quinoa Wrap
Mildly spiced black bean & quinoa rounds baked & wrapped with mixed greens, avocado, tomato, goat cheese & a chili lime cilantro dressing. Choice of side soup or salad.
12
Chicken Feta Wrap
Chicken, tomatoes, cucumber, feta & mixed greens drizzled with in house ranch & wrapped in a soft tortilla. Choice of side soup or salad.
12
Croque Monsieur
Shaved ham, gruyere cheese & French mustard sandwich lightly toasted, then broiled with more gruyere cheese & béchamel sauce topping. Choice of side salad or soup.
15
FROZEN MEALS & SOUPS TO GO
♥ Take it home ♥
Delicious meals pre-made in house are ready for you to whip up when you want.
CATERING
♥ Call to order ♥
We have custom menus for our clients for all events and occasions.
RESERVATIONS AND PRIVATE BOOKINGS
♥ Call to make a reservation ♥
Space available or you business meetings, bridal showers, and any other special event. Personalized menus available
SALADS
All salads come with toasted and buttered naan
Salad Yvette
(A playful twist on my aunt's Greek salad)
Greens, feta, kalamata olives, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, bell peppers, and Greek-style dressing.
Add Quinoa $2.00
12
The Maple Dragon
Mixed greens, roasted yam, cucumber, julienned carrot, baby tomatoes. With in house hummus, avocado, feta cheese, sunflower/pumpkin seeds and a maple syrup soya vinaigrette.
12
Cobb Salad
Mixed greens topped with egg, bacon, chicken, choice of feta or blue cheese, tomato, cucumber & finished with in house ranch dressing.
14
Bebe Bowl
Sautéed mushrooms and vegetables tossed with quinoa. Topped with goat cheese, fresh arugula.
French vinaigrette and pesto drizzle.
12
